question: Noah has 80 square meters of banana field. There are 33 bananas per square meter. Noah can harvest his bananas every 1 months. How many bananas can Noah harvest within a year?
answer:
Noah has 33*80= <<33*80=2640>>2640 bananas on his field.
Noah can harvest his bananas 12 / 1 = <<12/1=12>>12 times per year
Therefore Noah can harvest 2640*12 = <<2640*12=31,680>>31,680 bananas per year.
#### 31,680
